Class EsaVectors

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.ir.sim.ml.esa.EsaVectors
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class EsaVectors
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Set of vector representation of a set of texts. It relates a vector and the text it represents *
